channel.title: Adding my server to the toplist!
channel.description: When i try to add my server to the toplist, and clicking "Register Server" and getting the link for verifying the server. I copy the verify link and going on my vps, for the correct ip to verify, then it says its the wrong ip. It gives me a random ip that i should verify with ... Can someone help me?

item.title: Adding my server to the toplist!
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

[quote=“iMichael, post:3, topic:430138”][quote author=RandQm link=topic=532815.msg3894634#msg3894634 date=1327196172]
Maybe post this in general questions,
this is obviously the wrong section
[/quote]’
cba to do maaan…[/quote]
Then nobody’s going to help you.

Read full topic
